name: Sofa Bed
description: Client is married with 2 young children (F/1, M/0) and the family of 4 is living together in a 2 room rental flat. The family would like to request for a sofa bed because F/1 likes to fall asleep on the couch instead of the bed and has fallen off the couch multiple times. For the child's safety, the family would like a sofa bed so that the child can sleep on the sofa bed without the parents having to worry about the child's safety. Parents are extremely hardworking and both have recently found full-time jobs and is working hard to support the family but have yet to receive their salary and are struggling financially at present.

contact.org: MSF Social Service Office @ Sengkang, Serangoon & Hougang
contact.name: Belle Teo
